content: free pattern on the blog http //www knitatude ca/blog/2020/7/1/wme54ip2b3t3dtlazbmjarkayuniov have 20 grams of worsted or dk weight lying around the house want to feel your inner 50s pine-up girl vibe come out want a pattern that s beginner friendly easy to whip up and fast introducing the pin me up headband super simple and the pattern is free i used 17 grams of leftover lionbrand lb collection cotton jeans don t forget to tag me in all your finished products on social media policies this pattern is a copyright of chantal miyagishima of knitatude pin me up headbands created using this pattern may be sold with credit given to knitatude / knitatude etsy com pattern and photos cannot be used for resale purposes please share your work with the hashtag #pinmeupheadband #knitatudeknits to share the handmade love
